abstract: United Technologies is interested in making bigger investments in alternative energy, possibly including a majority stake in wind turbine maker Clipper Windpower, a top executive at the diversified U.S. manufacturer said on Thursday.
snippet: United Technologies is interested in making bigger investments in alternative energy, possibly including a majority stake in wind turbine maker Clipper Windpower, a top executive at the diversified U.S. manufacturer said on Thursday.
lead_paragraph: United Technologies is interested in making bigger investments in alternative energy, possibly including a majority stake in wind turbine maker Clipper Windpower, a top executive at the diversified United States manufacturer said on Thursday, Reuters reported.

headline.main: United Tech Considers ‘Bigger Bets’ in Clean Energy
